meanings.definition: The person who believes in myths.
meanings.sent1: As a mythiest, Sarah enjoys reading about ancient legends and folklore.
meanings.sent2: The mythiest in the group always has an interesting story to share.
meanings.sent3: The mythiest at the party was convinced they saw a unicorn in the backyard.
meanings.sent4: In a world of skeptics, he stood out as the mythiest, embracing every fantastical tale.
meanings.sent5: The young girl, a true mythiest, found magic in every shadow and mystery in every whisper.

meanings.sent1: Legends say the dragon guarding the treasure was the mythiest creature of all.
meanings.sent2: The ancient castle, shrouded in mist, was considered the mythiest place in the kingdom.
meanings.sent3: The mythiest sword in the land was said to grant its wielder invincibility.
meanings.sent4: Among all the artifacts, the crown was the mythiest, rumored to bestow eternal power.
meanings.sent5: In the heart of the forest, hidden from all, lay the mythiest tree, said to possess ancient wisdom.
